template.name: Website Backend Assets (used in backend interface)
Website Editor Assets (used in website editor)

a.t-attf-class: #{link_class or ''} #{'active' if submenu.clean_url() and unslug_url(request.httprequest.path) == unslug_url(submenu.clean_url()) else ''}

t.t-value: { 'lang': lang and lang.replace('_', '-'), 'data-website-id': website.id if website else None, 'data-editable': '1' if editable else None, 'data-translatable': '1' if translatable else None, 'data-edit_translations': '1' if edit_translations else None, 'data-view-xmlid': xmlid if editable or translatable else None, 'data-viewid': viewid if editable or translatable else None, 'data-main-object': repr(main_object) if editable or translatable else None, 'data-oe-company-name': res_company.name }

t.t-if: main_object and 'website_meta_title' in main_object and main_object.website_meta_title
not additional_title and main_object and 'name' in main_object

meta.t-if: main_object and 'website_indexed' in main_object and not main_object.website_indexed
meta.name: robots

t.t-value: main_object and 'website_meta_description' in main_object and main_object.website_meta_description or website_meta_description
main_object and 'website_meta_keywords' in main_object and main_object.website_meta_keywords or website_meta_keywords

script.t-if: website and website.google_analytics_key and not editable

attribute.name: t-attf-class
attribute.add: #{'o_header_overlay' if 'header_overlay' in main_object and main_object.header_overlay else ''}

template.name: Brand Promotion
template.div: Create a free website with Odoo

div.p: We are a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems.
Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.

ul.t-if: (request and request.is_frontend_multilang and len(languages) > 1) or (website and (editable or translatable))

a.t-att-data-default-lang: (editable or translatable) and 'true' if website and lg[0] == website.default_lang_code else None

t.t-raw: website.kanban(model, domain, column, template, step=step, scope=scope, orderby=orderby)

a.t-att-href: '%s,%s-%s' % (obj['kanban_url'], obj['column_id'].id, (obj['page'] < obj['page_end'] and obj['page']+1 or obj['page_end']) )

t.p: Information about the instance of Odoo, the Open Source ERP.

div.p: Note: To hide this page, uncheck it from the top Customize menu.
This page does not exist, but you can create it as you are administrator of this site.

div.div: Edit the content below this line to adapt the default "page not found" page.

div.p: The following error was raised in the website controller
The error occured while rendering the template and evaluating the following expression:
The page you were looking for could not be authorized.
Maybe you were looking for one of these popular pages ?
The page you were looking for could not be found; it is possible you have typed the address incorrectly, but it has most probably been removed due to the recent website reorganisation.
Maybe you were looking for one of these popular pages ?

label.p: The selected templates will be reset to their factory settings.
Type 'yes' in the box below if you want to confirm.

div.p: An error occured while rendering the template .
If this error is caused by a change of yours in the templates, you have the possibility to reset one or more templates to their factory settings.

t.div: Your search '' did not match any pages.
There are currently no pages for your website.

i.title: Is the page included in the main menu?
Is the page indexed by search engines?

t.t-value: (next_page and page.url != next_page.url) or not next_page or specific_page

i.t-if: specific_page and prev_page and prev_page.url == page.url and not prev_page.website_id

i.t-attf-title: This page will be visible on {{ date_formatted }}
